Mi-24 Work In Progress
================


Remodeled the canopy glass and worked on the glass shader, dust deposit and windscreen wiper streaks. 
I also put in some silicone sealant to avoid the hard transition between glass and canopy struts.
Two more 8K texture patches showing the decal in the back and one for center belly section.
